name: Silent Rain
description:
Silent Rain is a challenging hide & seek co-op horror game where each try, and death, will give you knowledge to go further on your next attempt.



Team up with friends or brave the terror alone in this immersive horror experience. Step into the House of Origins, a haunted mansion where every corner holds the presence of an enigmatic doctor who will stop at nothing to capture and kill you.



Explore the mansion's rooms and unravel its mysteries while evading the grasp of the pursuing doctor, making every decision crucial to your survival.
Every attempt will allow you to gather knowledge on the house, on it's resident but also on the various object who can help you during your investigation.



Silent Rain offers an intense gameplay experience that demands coordination to make it through unscathed. Work together with your teammates, utilizing different objects to overcome the challenges that lie ahead.

Can you unravel the secrets of the haunted mansion and escape the mysterious doctor? Embrace the challenge and discover if you have what it takes to survive the Silent Rain.
